questionNl: Vertel wat Lisa op de markt kan kopen. Vertel of jij ook graag naar de markt gaat.
questionEn: Tell what Lisa can buy at the market. Tell whether you also like going to the market.

modelAnswer.transcript: Lisa can buy vegetables and fruit at the market. I see tomatoes and apples. I also like going to the market. The food is fresh and cheaper than in the supermarket.
modelAnswer.transcriptNl: Lisa kan groenten en fruit kopen op de markt. Ik zie tomaten en appels. Ik ga ook graag naar de markt. Het eten is vers en goedkoper dan in de supermarkt.

tips: First describe what you see in the picture, then give your opinion.
Use the person's name (Lisa) in your answer.
Give a reason for your opinion - don't just say 'yes' or 'no'.
